arg.g: the cross of the protopapas high priest
In the church of the monastery of Mar Elias Shwayya where the archbishop resides in the summer

example.arg: في كنيسة دير مار إلياس شويا مقر البطريارك الصيفي

arg.g: which was attended by the head of the monastery and a number of worshippers

example.arg: شارك فيه رئيس الدير المطران لياس نجم و عدد من المؤمنين
